net.sf.clickclick.jquery.control
Class JQColorPicker

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.click.control.AbstractControl
      org.apache.click.control.Field
          org.apache.click.control.TextField
              net.sf.clickclick.jquery.control.JQColorPicker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.click.Control
public class JQColorPicker
extends org.apache.click.control.TextField

Provides a ColorPicker control based on the JQuery ColorPicker plugin: http://www.eyecon.ro/colorpicker/.

See Also:
Serialized Form

addJsTemplate

protected void addJsTemplate(java.util.List headElements)
Add the JQColorPicker JavaScript template to the list of head elements.

You can override this method to add your own template.

Parameters:
headElements - the list of head elements to include for this control

addCustomCssImport

protected void addCustomCssImport(java.util.List headElements)
Add the JQColorPicker CSS style import to the list of head elements.

The CSS style import is: colorPickerStyleImport.

You can override this method to add your own custom import.

Parameters:
headElements - the list of head elements to include for this control
